text: IN THE MOMENTS after LeBron James topped Stephen Curry's 37 points with an ageless 42-point, 17-rebound effort to lift the Los Angeles Lakers to a 120-112 win in their latest duel, the Golden State Warriors star had to hear 'I Love L.A.' blare as he ran into the storied franchise's newest superstar.
"No. 17 Kansas defeated Colorado 71-59 on Tuesday night at Allen Fieldhouse. The Jayhawks (17-7
column3: 8-5 Big 12) won their first of two matchups between the sides. A big reason for that was KU’s defense — a calling card for Bill Self teams. The Jayhawks stepped up on that end in pivotal moments
column4: doing so in a new look of sorts on Tuesday."
